name: Ragnarok (Inconsistent Pixels)
description:
You are a viking that is more curious than the average viking. You always seem to push the boundary a little too far. Most of the time it works in your favor and everyone profits.....but eventually it'll all come crashing down in a blaze of glory. 

Explore, loot, and discover as you set sail to the West and become the first person to step foot on the unknown, new world. See what mysteries are waiting for you and discover things that will change the fabric of reality.

Credits:

Peter Milko for "Gurb's Adventure Tileset"

https://petermilko.itch.io/gurbs-adventure

sonDanielson for "Gameboy Simple RPG tileset"

https://materialfuture.itch.io/gameboy-assets
